name: Priority One
description:
This is a prototype for an RPG with starcraft/MOBA style controls that I've been working on in my spare time for a while now. Unlike a lot of similar games, the focus here is mostly on mechanics and challenging yourself to play as quickly as possible.

Despite its status as a prototype, it has around 1-2 hours of content, 4 bosses, crafting, difficulty modes, and a skill tree for each of the four playable characters. It's definitely a bit rough around the edges and buggy though.

Anyways, I just figured I'd throw this out there to see if anyone was interested in giving it a try.
